content: quote: Originally posted by donniejanuarysr: Well just want to share a little good news, My 7th grandson, 11th grandchild came into the world yesterday evening at 7:36pm, The fella weighed 6lbs 15oz, and was 20" long. I just thought I could share a little good news that might hopfuly overshadow the world news for a few hours. D.J. Accept my apologizes for being late in congratulations. D.J. May you enjoy all of your grandchildren as I enjoyed my grandparents until they left this world. I only had a short time with my parents and so my grandparents and all of my aunts and uncles have always been special to me. Love 'em all I say and enjoy family best. LJ

I only had a short time with my parents and so my grandparents and all of my aunts and uncles have always been special to me. Love 'em all I say and enjoy family best. LJ
title: Somthing good came into the world

content: Well the little feller is having a rough start i reckon, he and parents were allowed to go home Friday afternoon then they ended up ahving to take him back to the hospitle, the little feller was turning yellow (jaundice), the hospitle kept him all weekend so they could put him under some lights and more fluid inorder to flush out the liver, aparently he is doing much better they let him go home Sunday evening, Thanks LJ , T., Bill, KJ110, reducetension, WP, stillkit, AKinNC, D.J.
